trans-unit.source: Defines the abstract methods required to implement a plug-in document serialization <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> collator.
trans-unit.target: Define os métodos abstratos necessários para implementar um agrupador de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> de serialização de documento de plug-in.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> is created with the <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator" /> method of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> é criado com o <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator" /> método o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" /> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> writes to the same output stream as is written to by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" /> that created the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> grava no mesmo fluxo de saída, conforme são gravados pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" /> que criou o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> is created with the <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator" /> method of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> é criado com o <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator" /> método o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" /> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> writes to the same output stream as is written to by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" /> that created the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> grava no mesmo fluxo de saída, conforme são gravados pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" /> que criou o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" />.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, initiates the start of a batch write operation.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, inicia uma operação de gravação de lote.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, cancels a synchronous <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.Write" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, cancela uma operação <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.Write" /> síncrona.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, cancels an asynchronous <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, cancela uma operação <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync" /> assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, completes a batch write operation.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, conclui uma operação de gravação de lote.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, synchronously writes a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> element to the serialization stream.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, grava de forma síncrona um elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> fornecido no fluxo de serialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.Write%2A> methods write to the stream associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> from the call to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.Write%2A> métodos gravados no fluxo associado a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> que criou o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> da chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The visual element to write to the serialization <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: O elemento visual a ser gravado na serialização <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, synchronously writes a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> element to the serialization stream.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, grava de forma síncrona um elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> fornecido no fluxo de serialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.Write%2A> method writes to the stream associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> from the call to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.Write%2A> método grava o fluxo associado a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> que criou o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> da chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> that is written to the stream.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> que é gravado no fluxo.

trans-unit.source: An object specifying preferences for how the material should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que especifica as preferências de como o material deve ser impresso.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, synchronously writes a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> element together with an associated print ticket to the serialization stream.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, grava de forma síncrona um elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> fornecido junto com um tíquete de impressão associado no fluxo de serialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.Write%2A> method writes to the stream associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> from the call to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.Write%2A> método grava o fluxo associado a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> que criou o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> da chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, asynchronously writes a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> element to the serialization stream.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, grava de forma assíncrona um elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> fornecido no fluxo de serialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync%2A> methods write to the stream associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> from the call to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync%2A> métodos gravados no fluxo associado a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> que criou o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> da chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The visual element to write to the serialization <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: O elemento visual a ser gravado na serialização <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, asynchronously writes a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> element to the serialization stream.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, grava de forma assíncrona um elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> fornecido no fluxo de serialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync%2A> methods write to the stream associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> from the call to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync%2A> métodos gravados no fluxo associado a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> que criou o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> da chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The visual element to write to the serialization <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: O elemento visual a ser gravado na serialização <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.

trans-unit.source: A caller-specified object to identify the asynchronous write operation.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto especificado pelo chamador para identificar a operação de gravação assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, asynchronously writes a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> element with a specified event identifier to the serialization stream.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, grava de forma assíncrona um elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> fornecido com um identificador de evento especificado para o fluxo de serialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync%2A> methods write to the stream associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> from the call to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync%2A> métodos gravados no fluxo associado a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> que criou o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> da chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: `userState` is passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingCompletedEventHandler> when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingCompleted> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: `userState` é passado para o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingCompletedEventHandler> quando o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingCompleted> evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: The visual element to write to the serialization <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: O elemento visual a ser gravado na serialização <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.

trans-unit.source: The default print preferences for the <c>visual</c> element.
trans-unit.target: As preferências de impressão padrão para o elemento <c>visual</c>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, asynchronously writes a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> element together with an associated print ticket to the serialization stream.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, grava de forma assíncrona um elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> fornecido junto com um tíquete de impressão associado no fluxo de serialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync%2A> method writes to the stream associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> from the call to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync%2A> método grava o fluxo associado a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> que criou o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> da chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: `printTicket` can be `null` if there are no preferred print settings.
trans-unit.target: `printTicket` pode ser `null` se não houver nenhuma configuração de impressão preferencial.

trans-unit.source: The visual element to write to the serialization <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: O elemento visual a ser gravado na serialização <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.

trans-unit.source: The default print preferences for the <c>visual</c> element.
trans-unit.target: As preferências de impressão padrão para o elemento <c>visual</c>.

trans-unit.source: A caller-specified object to identify the asynchronous write operation.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto especificado pelo chamador para identificar a operação de gravação assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, asynchronously writes a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> element together with an associated print ticket and identifier to the serialization stream.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, grava de forma assíncrona um elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> fornecido junto com um identificador e tíquete de impressão associado para o fluxo de serialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync%2A> method writes to the stream associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> from the call to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync%2A> método grava o fluxo associado a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> que criou o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> da chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: `printTicket` can be `null` if there are no preferred print settings.
trans-unit.target: `printTicket` pode ser `null` se não houver nenhuma configuração de impressão preferencial.

trans-unit.source: `userState` is passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingCompletedEventHandler> when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingCompleted> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: `userState` é passado para o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingCompletedEventHandler> quando o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingCompleted> evento ocorre.
